name: Aftermath (itch) (Waltermelion)
description:
This game was made during quarentine by a small Portuguese 6 man group for our final school project. At first it started as a VR game but due to deadlines we decided to make it into a regular first person horrorish game.

This game is called Aftermath, set in the zombie apocalipse you discover a bunker, are you alone or does something lurk in the dark?

Search the rooms for keys to advance to the next room, find out what happend to the world by reading journals or watching the tv, reach the laboratory  at the end to find... something.

KeysControlsWASDMovementSpaceJumpingMouseLookLeftMouseButtonPick up objects

The game has a LOT of physics objects so it may not work on some machines!

There's also some easter eggs, try to find them all out ;) (some of them are inside jokes)

 None of us had ever made a game before so this was a big challenge especially since only one of us was working with Unity.
